introductions: Are you here to listen to my sermon, child? | Oh, so you're looking into [Victim]'s murder?  What have I to do with this? | You would implicate the Lord's servant in such a horrendous act?  Perhaps you should focus on saving your own soul before you try and save the souls of this town.
openers: Have you come to listen to my sermon, or to accuse me of being sinful?
You lack the amount of faith that I would hope to see from one who seeks to rid us of evil.
closers: Do you make a habit of avoiding your troubles?
I hope to see you at mass, child.  You may need it the most.
